title: Video: Surma – Hemma
body:
Was hypnotised by the debut track from Lisbon’s **Surma**, and her latest offers up a similarly stunning soundscape.

With visuals directed and produced by CASOTA Collective, it’s shudderingly unique and somehow perfectly fitting to the ethereal, otherworldly nature of Surma’s music. Check out _Hemma_ below, lifted from her debut album out later in the year on Omnichord Records.

With visuals directed and produced by CASOTA Collective, it’s shudderingly unique and somehow perfectly fitting to the ethereal, otherworldly nature of Surma’s music. Check out Hemma below, lifted from her debut album out later in the year \[…\]
